title: Physical properties of newly synthesized noncentrosymmetric TaIr2B2 and NbIr2B2 superconductors: an extensive comparison of GGA and LDA functional investigations
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,17140-17151
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02822H, Paper

Jakiul Islam, Mohasena Ahamed, Md. Saiful Alam, Newaz Mohammad Bahadur
In recent years, noncentrosymmetric (NCS) structural compounds have received much attention from the scientific community in the exploration for the unconventional nature of superconductivity with exciting physical properties.
